data.partBlankContent: Friendships can fade over time. But I believe th__ the stro_____ ones ne___ truly d__. Even i_ two fri____ find thems_____ far ap___ from o__ another, a go__ conversation c__ renew th___ connection. These type of friendships are a bond that will last a lifetime.
data.fullContent: Friendships can fade over time. But I believe that the strongest ones never truly die. Even if two friends find themselves far apart from one another, a good conversation can renew their connection. These type of friendships are a bond that will last a lifetime.
data.answer: 友谊会随着时间的推移而褪色。但我相信，最坚固的友谊永远不会真正褪去。即使两个朋友发现彼此相距很远，一次愉快的交谈也能使他们的关系重新建立起来。这种类型的友谊会持续一生。
